name: HomeTime
0:
”Alexa, start home time.”
”Alexa, ask home time when can I go home.”
”Alexa, tell home time to change time to 5pm.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home time
des:
Ask Alexa when your working hours are over and she'll tell you the remaining time. 

Default home time is 18:00. If this does not fit to you, you can easily say "Alexa, tell home time to change time to 17:00".

This skill assumes that you are in CET Timezone, i.e. -1 from GMT.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
